title: Buttspoons Fanart
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[module CSS]]
.email-example .collapsible-block-folded a.collapsible-block-link {
    animation: blink 0.8s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
}
@keyframes blink {
    0% { color: transparent; }
    50%, 100% { color: #b01; }
}
.email {border: solid 2px #000000; width: 88%; padding: 1px 15px; margin: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}
.email-example a.collapsible-block-link {font-weight: bold;}
.tofrom {margin-left: 10px; margin-top: 5px; padding: 1px 15px; border-left: solid 3px maroon}
[[/module]]
[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art:buttspoons-fanart/Buttspoons%20Fanart.jpeg]]
[[/=]]
@@           @@



[[div class="email-example"]]
[[=]]
[[collapsible show="Access SCiPNET Email? One (1) new message!" hide="SCP-7052 Incident Report 04-01-2024"]]
[[<]]

@@ @@
[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** SITE_19_STAFF
**From:** site19.maintenance@scp.int
**Subject:** SCP-7052 Incident Report 04-01-2024
[[/div]]
------

Attention Site-19 Personnel,

As per our last email regarding the sitewide SCP-7052 incident, we would like to apologize for our negligence and mishandling of the waste produced from SCP-7052 testing. We understand that this oversight has posed a significant health hazard to Site-19 personnel and residents, and would like to remind anyone who believes they have been affected to schedule a physical wellness assessment at their earliest availability.  

We have since implemented new measures to prevent a repeat of this incident. Moving forward, research personnel involved in SCP-7052 experiments are to mark used spoons with provided "RECTAL USE ONLY" labels, which can be found in testing-approved containment chambers. Additionally, we have moved the SCP-7052 waste disposal location to a wing further away from Site-19's canteen. We hope these measures are sufficient in preventing future mix-ups between SCP-7052 spoons and regular dining utensils. 

Thank you for your patience,

Site-19 Cafeteria Services
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@         @@
author: Harmacy
